name: MEC Flex Nordic Hybrid Soft Shell Tights - Women's
description:
Stride on in cold conditions. The front panels on these Nordic tights use a polyurethane membrane to block chilly gusts. The highly breathable thermal fleece back panels feel great against the skin, and are highly breathable to keep you from overheating when you're powering into a headwind.Windproof front panels are 3-layer polyester soft shell with a polyurethane laminate and DWR finish.Fabric has 4-way stretch for full mobility.Brushed Miti Lombardia nylon and spandex thermal rear panels are sweat-wicking and weather-resistant.Wide elastic waist has soft nylon mesh at the back for moisture management.Right thigh pocket.Knee darts for range of motion.Lower leg zippers with gripper elastic work with a variety of footwear.Reflective details keep you visible.

Body fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
